# Auto-generated by Buildroot (or custom)

# Enable 64-bit kernel
arm_64bit=1

# Enable UART (Serial Console) for debugging
enable_uart=1

# Audio
dtparam=audio=on

# Display
dtoverlay=vc4-kms-v3d

# Camera/Display auto-detection
camera_auto_detect=1
display_auto_detect=1

# Initialize the DWC2 USB controller (common for Compute Modules)
dtoverlay=dwc2,dr_mode=host
